function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Transmissivity of covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on mental health of workers","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Late public health response by the uk government","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low productivity and job losses due to public health measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreased output of construction industry due to withdrawal of government intervention","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Labour shortages in the construction industry due to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate communication and training on covid-19 interventions for businesses","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disputes between employers and contractors due to lack of timely notices","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 within construction sites and facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of coronavirus disease 2019 covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Facile transmission of sars-cov-2 via the air","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in determining the distribution and magnitude of infected populations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of early warning system for pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in scaling conventional testing for mass surveillance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of environmental science tools for monitoring pandemic spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited testing capacity and throughput due to current diagnostic methods","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient targeting of higher-risk sub-populations for testing","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy, ethics, and legal concerns limiting the application of wbe","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for undetected outbreaks in confined subpopulations like schools, hospitals, and warehouses.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limitations of manufacturing and supply chains for diagnostic testing.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data-driven strategy for reopening and closing economies during resurgence of outbreaks.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Early re-opening of businesses and termination of population isolation could lead to a covid-19 rebound or seasonal re-emergence.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wbe may detect covid-19 before it is possible with random diagnostic testing, but the timing of virus shedding is uncertain.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in the timing of shedding sars-cov-2 into stool and persistence of shedding after symptoms resolve poses challenges for wbe.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Occupational exposure to contagious diseases from sampling sewage","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitation of wbe to direct measures of viral infection such as pcr or antigen testing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sampling and sample preparation for sewage analysis","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for significant forward transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of accurate information on the proportion of the total population that remains uninfected","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased willingness to comply with government recommendations for distancing and self-isolation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Asymptomatic infections persist, leading to undetected clusters of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research and collaboration across scientific disciplines for the development of wbe as a public health tool.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient understanding of the correlation between wbe data and community-wide population demographics in relation to contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain signal calibration for covid-19 marker in wbe monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitations of qualitative approach in wbe monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of intercommunity comparison in semi-quantitative approach of wbe monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited understanding of intra-and inter-person variability in the magnitude of virus excretion/shedding","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding the excretion-route distribution of virus markers, fecal versus urine and unknown importance for different markers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about the half-life persistence of virus markers in wastewater and its impact on sampling methods and measurement accuracy","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of sewage networks and treatment plants can lead to delayed detection of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in accurately estimating the population size contributing to a sewage treatment plant can result in inaccurate calculations of the percentage of infected population","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison of infection rates between communities using wbe monitoring data requires careful calibration and standardization procedures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient monitoring data for contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient testing leading to lack of confidence in the public about the risk of covid-19 transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possibility of repeated resurgence of covid-19 and common seasonal infectious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on preprints without peer review for research and decision-making","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of international coordination in wbe research for covid-19 and other infectious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of pcr to test for covid-19 may overestimate the incidence or intensity of existing infections due to rna fragments from virus remnants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate surveillance systems may result in delayed detection of emerging clusters of infectious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infection densities revealed by wbe monitoring may uncover community vulnerabilities related to race, ethnicity, socioeconomic status, occupation, age structure, and climate","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
